author: perezhilton
title: Everything You Need To Know About Donald Trump's Cabinet Of Horrors…
text:
He makes Dr. Caligari look like an absolute angel.
There are only nine days left until Donald Trump 's impending apocalypse inauguration… but believe it or not, he's not going to be the worst person in the White House.
That's because the racist Republican has to fill all 16 seats in his Cabinet — plus seven more Cabinet-level positions — which means more bigots in power than ever before!
In addition to known homophobe Mike Pence , Trump's team is already shaping up to be one of the scariest in American history … largely because they're mostly millionaire and billionaire businesspeople.
But we're sure they're totally gonna fight for Middle America over their own corporate interests…
